ai-ya5.3.4:1.1_0: One who understands about suffering, gives up the origin of suffering, and doesn’t give it up.
ai-ya5.3.4:2.1_0: And when you give up suffering, they give up suffering.
ai-ya5.3.4:3.1_0: One who doesn’t completely understand suffering, its origin, its cessation, and the path.
ai-ya5.3.4:4.1_0: They don’t completely understand suffering, but don’t give rise to the origin of suffering.
ai-ya5.3.4:4.1_1: the origin of the path dispensation, the perfected ones, and the fully awakened Buddhas. They don’t dispel the origin of suffering.
ai-ya5.3.4:5.1_0: And when you don’t give up suffering, they don’t completely understand suffering.
ai-ya5.3.4:6.1_0: the origin of the path, the ending of suffering, but not the truth of suffering.
ai-ya5.3.4:6.1_1: the origin of the path dispensation, the perfected ones, the fully awakened Buddhas, and the origin of suffering, not the suffering.
